display_long_description:
This free demo of Marble Mechanics is Identical to the full version except you can not save or load sandbox creations, unlock achievements or compete on leaderboards. 

Get the full game here: https://www.meta.com/experiences/marble-mechanics/7559660774126220/

**Marble Mechanics** is a captivating VR game that transports you into a world where you can create and simulate intricate marble runs. The game offers a variety of track elements - from funnels, loops, spirals, to splitters and turns, all of which can be effortlessly customized and aligned for a seamless marble journey. Grouping of track elements is a breeze, allowing for easy manipulation of large sections. Features like duplication, deletion, and saving of track groups to the Track Box enhance the user experience. With infinite undo/redo options and the ability to save, share, and re-simulate your favorite runs, Marble Mechanics offers endless possibilities for fun and creativity.

With four tutorials, five puzzles, over 30 achievements to unlock and four Leaderboards to climb, have fun exploring Marble Mechanics!
